attributes.action: bring back the Paul o'Grady organ game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the whole competitions row with the major television broadcasters, channel 4 and the like axed all the competions to its shows including the Paul o'Grady organ game as well as Deal or No Deal.

Last series the show was allowed to do 4? special organ games. However I and the below wish for the organ game to come back daily to our screens, because it livens up the show, with paul twinkling the ivories!

So Channel 4 please bring it back!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
